channel.title: Comments on: Seeds are Sown
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: It was around this age that my dad bought "me" a computer for my birthday. A few years later he bought "me" and Atari with aviation games and such. It was at this point that my mom started picking out my gifts.
item.content:encoded: It was around this age that my dad bought “me” a computer for my birthday. A few years later he bought “me” and Atari with aviation games and such. It was at this point that my mom started picking out my gifts.
